body:
Starting Point
=============

* [Eloquent JavaScript](http://eloquentjavascript.net/)
* [Patterns For Large-Scale JavaScript Application Architecture](http://addyosmani.com/largescalejavascript/) 
* [CoffeeScript under Pressure](http://mattdw.github.com/2012/rapid-coffee-postmortem.html)
* [A re-introduction to JavaScript (Mozilla)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/JavaScript/A_re-introduction_to_JavaScript)
* [https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Introduction_to_Object-Oriented_JavaScript (Mozilla)](https://developer.mozilla.org/en/Introduction_to_Object-Oriented_JavaScript)

Frameworks You Should Know About
--------------------------------
* [backbone.js](http://documentcloud.github.com/backbone/)
* [backbone patterns](http://ricostacruz.com/backbone-patterns/ backbone patterns)
name: belfastjs.github.com
